title: Software Engineer | Omar BR
description: Software engineer with over 6 years of experience in web and mobile development, mainly with ReactJS, JavaScript, TypeScript, React Native, NodeJS, GraphQL, HTML5, CSS3, MaterialUI; with strong background in Design, UI/UX, Marketing, SEO, Monetization, E-Commerces, E-Learning, and more!
